department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 提供環境工程於成本效益（包括外溢價值）之經濟學概念，藉由學習與討論，使學生在執行環境工程專案之規劃、設計與施工時，能提出較符合經濟效益的評估方案。
goal.en: Provide the concepts of economics that engineers need to know how to carry out the economic evaluation of environmental engineering tasks and projects.

outline.ch:
§環境經濟學概述
§工程經濟學概要
§環境品質與自然資源價值衡量方法
§價值分析：成本與利益分析、成本效果分析（現值法、投資報酬率分析法、回收年限分析法）
§環境工程決策分析 - 層級分析法、多目標評級技術
§應用綠色核算概念於環境工程經濟分析
outline.en:
§Fundamentals of environmental economics
§Introduction of engineering economics
§Measures of environmental quality and resource values
§Value analysis: cost-and-benefit analysis, cost-effectiveness analysis (present value method, internal rate of return method, payback period method)
§Environmental engineering policy analysis: analytic hierarchy analysis, multi-criteria analysis
§Application of green accounting concept in economic analysis of environmental engineering

textbook.ch:
§Barry C. Field & Martha K. Field, Environmental Economics – An Introduction, 8th Edition, McGraw-Hill Education, Inc.
§William G. Sullivan, Elin M. Wicks, and James T. Luxhoj, Engineering Economy, 13th Edition, Pearson Education International, Inc.
§Tom Tietenberg, Environmental Natural Resource Economics, 7th Edition, Pearson Education, Inc.
textbook.en:
§Barry C. Field & Martha K. Field, Environmental Economics – An Introduction, 8th Edition, McGraw-Hill Education, Inc.
§William G. Sullivan, Elin M. Wicks, and James T. Luxhoj, Engineering Economy, 13th Edition, Pearson Education International, Inc.
§Tom Tietenberg, Environmental Natural Resource Economics, 7th Edition, Pearson Education, Inc.

gradMethod.ch: 期中報告 35%  期末報告 50%  作業練習及課堂表現 15%
gradMethod.en: Midterm report 35%  Final report 50%  Assignments & learning performance 15%

ch.competencies: 以人為本的社會價值與環境價值判斷與抉擇能力
符合系統思維的環境問題發現、分析及解決能力
合乎情理法的環境科學知識與工程技術運用能力
前瞻宏觀的需求分析、規劃決策及科技研發能力
積極有效的溝通表達、協調合作及整合領導能力
持續不斷的人文、科學及工程智能學習創新能力

en.competencies: The ability to justify principles of judgment and choice with considering the relation between social welfare and environmental sustainability
The ability to define and analyze environmental issues, to strategically plan and propose potential solutions
The ability to implement scientific knowledge and engineering techniques in the face of environmental problems
The ability to assess prospective needs at the macro level, to formulate decision-making, and to direct R & D.
The ability to lead positive and effective communication, coordination, cooperation and integration.
The ability to persistently innovate intelligent humanities, science and engineering.
